title: Introduction to Computer Science
subject: Computer Science
description: A comprehensive introduction to computer science fundamentals, covering programming basics, data structures, and algorithms for beginners.
author: John Smith

title: Advanced Programming Concepts
subject: Computer Science
description: Deep dive into complex programming paradigms and design patterns for experienced developers seeking to elevate their coding skills.
author: Sarah Johnson

title: Digital Marketing for Tech Professionals
subject: Business
description: Learn digital marketing strategies tailored for the tech industry, including SEO, content marketing, and social media tactics for tech products.
author: Michael Brown

title: Calculus for Computer Scientists
subject: Mathematics
description: Practical calculus applications in computing and programming with concrete examples and exercises relevant to software development.
author: Lisa Chen

title: Statistics and Probability
subject: Mathematics
description: Essential statistical methods for data analysis, covering probability distributions, hypothesis testing, and regression analysis for data scientists.
author: David Williams
